summary:
I am a creative, resourceful, and T-shape geoscientist, experienced in seismic interpretation and integrating data for prospect maturation and ranking in worldwide geological settings. Over last 17 years I have been working with integrated G&G teams providing fundamental geological support at Assess, Concept, Select and Define phase of EP&ET funnel from seismic processing to dynamic modeling and well operations. 
I like to use my strong analytical skills and my proven ability to generate new ideas and innovative solutions as well as share knowledge with my colleagues. Self-driven, can work independently and also flourish as part of a team, use proactive mindset and excellent cooperation skills.  I am flexible for travel.
